title: Disgusting, bankrupt Rasputins
text:
More 
It is now so crystal-clear to all Malaysians, again, how some leaders and so-called people’s representatives have revealed their fast bankrupting political antics. 
The lion dance performance before our prime minister and his wife was turned and spun as a ‘brave’ act where even the dancers did not want to honour our leader. 
A media’s online video was quickly clutched as a heavyweight knockout as these diabolic and convoluted individuals hit the incomplete video onto the social media expressway. 
Naive and gullible citizens were dumbfounded as they watched the video showing an almost motionless lion before the nation’s number one, seemingly not wanting to perform. 
But the complete version of the dance soon revealed the whole truth. The lion dancers were peeling a pomelo and oranges to present to Najib Abdul Razak. This symbolises honour as the Chinese tradition goes. 
The whole truth is now out! 
Now the whole nation awakens to measure the shameless lies and diabolic spins of some leaders and so called people’s representatives. 
Not only are such individuals and party representatives bankrupt to the marrow, they have confirmed what we in BN have unequivocally maintained. 
All the lies, spins and exploitative tactics of those opposed to our current leadership must be shunned and shamed by Malaysians who uphold honour, integrity and truth. 
To these Rasputins bent on destroying our nation’s pride and prestige, I have this to say: 
What peace, progress and prosperity that are continuously being built by BN cannot be broken by bankrupt, rotten Rasputins. 
This lion dance episode says it all, loud and clear. 
M KAYVEAS is president, myPPP.
